mapper.select: select NOTICE_NUM as "num", ADMIN_ID as "id", NOTICE_TYPE as "type", NOTICE_SUBJECT as "subject", NOTICE_CONTENT as "content", NOTICE_DATE as "date", NOTICE_READCOUNT as "readcount", NOTICE_IMAGE as "image" from NOTICE where NOTICE_NUM = #{num}
select FAQ_NUM as "num", ADMIN_ID as "id", FAQ_SUBJECT as "subject", FAQ_CONTENT as "content" from FAQ where FAQ_NUM = #{num}
mapper.delete: delete from WISH WHERE MEM_ID = #{id} AND LES_NUM = #{num}
mapper.insert: insert into QNA(MEM_ID, QNA_SUBJECT, QNA_QUESTION, QNA_UPDATE) values(#{name}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{update})
insert into LESSON_QNA(MEM_ID, LES_NUM, LQNA_SUBJECT, LQNA_QUESTION, LQNA_UPDATE) values(#{name}, #{num}, #{subject}, #{question}, #{update})
insert into REVIEW(MEM_ID, LES_NUM, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_UPDATE, REVIEW_IMAGE, REVIEW_RATING) values(#{id}, #{num}, #{content}, #{update}, #{preview}, #{rating})
